alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A line of heavy showers with isolated thunderstorms will impact western San Luis Obispo County through 415 AM PST... At 255 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers with isolated embedded thunderstorms which will affect western San Louis Obispo County through 410 am. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Luis Obispo... Paso Robles... Morro Bay... Pismo Beach... Atascadero... Cambria... Santa Margarita... Avila Beach... Cayucos... Baywood-Los Osos... Lake Nacimiento... San Miguel... Hearst Castle... Templeton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
